PERSONA:
meet sandra, a 55-year-old married woman from a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. born and raised in the country, sandra is a white non-hispanic american with a high school education.

despite her modest income of less than $30,000 per year, sandra is a dedicated member of the democratic party, aligning herself with moderate to conservative ideologies. her religious beliefs lie within the protestant faith, though she only attends religious services a few times a year.

sandra takes pride in being a registered voter and actively participates in the democratic process. while she may not be an avid internet user, she stays informed about current events and political developments.

in her free time, sandra enjoys simple pleasures like spending quality time with her family and engaging in occasional volunteer work within her community. her down-to-earth nature and strong values reflect her upbringing in the south, where she has built a life centered around her faith, family, and civic responsibilities.
